title: I am getting slow WiFi speeds, maybe 2 to 3 Mbps download
content:
I am getting slow WiFi speeds, maybe 2 to 3 Mbps download. I know it's not my router because I can test my router separately. It gets the full speed fine.

I also tried testing speeds in safe mode and am getting the same results.

Thoughts? Anyone else seeing this?

Also wondering if this related to the latest security release (May)
